thread.title: Nissan's 'Easy Drive' moves into the self driving car market

title: Nissan's 'Easy Drive' moves into the self driving car market
text:
Nissan's 'Easy Drive' moves into the self driving car market 2:07pm GMT - 01:41 
Nissan Motor Co begins its push into the self-driving service car market with its new service 'Easy Ride', in a bid to rival Uber. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Nissan Motor Co begins its push into the self-driving service car market with its new service 'Easy Ride', in a bid to rival Uber. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EPgiZN
